data.title: May 22, 2013 Company name: Murata Manufacturing Co., Ltd ...
data.meta_description: May 22, 2013 Company name: Murata Manufacturing Co., Ltd ...
data.text: May 22, 2013 Company name: Name of representative: Contact: Murata Manufacturing Co., Ltd. Tsuneo Murata President & Representative Director (Code: 6981, First section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange and the Osaka Securities Exchange) Yutaka Soramoto General Administration Manager (Phone: 075-955-6502) Notice regarding Partial Amendments to the Articles of Incorporation We hereby give notice that the Company, at the meeting of its Board of Directors held today, resolved that the Company shall propose to the 77th Ordinary General Meeting of Shareholders of the Company, to be held on June 27, 2013, to amend the Articles of Incorporation of the Company. 1. Reasons for the amendments (1) In preparation for diversification of the contents of businesses and future business deployment, the Company proposes to add a business purpose with respect to the purpose in Article 2 of the present Articles of Incorporation. In accordance with this, the item number will be moved down. (2) From the perspective of expansion of the services for the shareholders, the Company proposes to establish Article 10 regarding demand for the sale of shares constituting less than one voting unit, and make necessary amendments corresponding to this, so that the Company may introduce a system for the sale of shares constituting less than one voting unit as provided for in Article 194 of the Companies Act. In accordance with this, the numbers of Article 10 and subsequent Articles of the present Articles of Incorporation will each be moved down one position. 2. Details of the amendments The proposed amendments are as follows: Present Articles of Incorporation Article 2 (Purpose) The purpose of the Company shall be to engage in the following businesses: 1.~14. (Text omitted) (Newly added) 15. All businesses which are incidental to or related to those mentioned in the preceding items. (Underlines show amended portions.) Articles of Incorporation after Amendment Article 2 (Purpose) The purpose of the Company shall be to engage in the following businesses: 1.~14. (Unchanged) 15. Generation and supply of electricity 16. All businesses which are incidental to or related to those mentioned in the preceding items.
